definition: chanyu (Han Dynasty name for chiefs of Xiongnu Huns 匈奴[Xiong1 nu2])
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Shan
surname Yu
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: The direct causation is the fighting for the Chanyu's heirdom.
sentences.chinese: 爭奪單于繼承權的鬥爭直接導致了匈奴的分裂。

sentences.english: As the rocket sped toward Mulan and Shan-Yu, Mulan pinned Shan-Yu to the roof with his sword.
sentences.chinese: 火箭衝向屋頂上的木蘭和單與，木蘭正用劍指着單于。

sentences.english: Mulan tried to find someone to help her as Shang presented Shan-Yu'ssword to the Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 李翔把單于的劍呈給皇帝，木蘭也正在四處找人幫忙。

sentences.english: Chanyu means the chief of Xiongnu.
Just then, Mulan fainted from the wound caused by Shan-Yu's sword.
sentences.chinese: 說完，木蘭因爲受到了單于的劍傷而昏到了。

sentences.english: So his name is Huhanye Chanyu.
sentences.chinese: 所以應該是呼韓邪單于。

sentences.english: The envoys tried to enrage Hun and made Chanyu to fight with Han.
sentences.chinese: 匈奴貴人使者作爲單于先行而入漢，死於中原。
